short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace gender specific pronouns (he/she), objects (him/her), and possessives (his/hers) with gender neutral alternatives.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces all gender specific pronouns (he/she), objects (him/her), and possessives (his/hers) on a Web page with gender neutral alternatives. [English language only]
